lines.text: Mayor Troger, it's not just Munich - it's our whole country. Six million ghosts have come back to haunt us.
We have the building surrounded. We're still waiting word from Israel. Until then we're working with one hand.
Just so long as it's a firm hand.
Your German guilt runs deep, hmmm?
You, sir, you don't know the meaning of guilt.

[Shocked when the terrorists take the helicopter pilots prisoner]
What the hell are they doing?

[Bitterly]
They are Arab terrorists. They are breaking their word.
